name: Yin and Yang
description:
This artwork describes an ideal object in reality. The balance between good and bad blends into a harmony. The blue color represents positive vibrations and the red color symbolizes the resulting bad effects. These two different existences will always exist in the times. They always looking for balance even though they are opposite each other. 
Likewise with technological developments. When local wisdom is transformed following technology. The growth of social media and metaverse gives birth to a new generation that must adapt to the real balance of life. Of course there will also be good and bad effects. Both will work in harmony if all humans are wise and aware of this.
